name: ZooCoin
description: Zoo is an ecosystem of decentralized applications powered by Fantom network. Primary project's token (ZOO) is utilized within the ecosystem among various of developed and planned projects - ZooWallet (portfolio monitoring), ZooPet (NFT marketplace), ZooCharts (charting provider), ZooDex (decentralized exchange), ZooTrade (trading insights). Zoo is ERC20 token on Fantom Nerwork. Our products are written using different technologies - backend (node.js / PostgreSQL), frontend (React), smart-contracts (Solidity).
